title: How is Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Vishwakarma Institute of Information Technology has now become an Autonomous Institute . Now it is providing B Tech degree instead of BE degree.Talking about its infrastructure, its pretty good with lots of facility.The institute has a wide campus spreaded over 8 acres.The Study environment is well satisfied along with moderately sufficient library facilities. The VIIT has one the best labs as comparing to others colleges across the city. But one should be own responsible for making the better use of all the facilities. There are different cells for the students such as Entrepreneurship Development Cell(EDC-VIIT), Avishkar(for those who are interested in acting, dancing, singing etc. and will get an opportunity to participate in various prestigious competitions such FIRODIYA KARANDAK and PURUSHOTTAM KARANDAK), RoboCon( a national level robotics competition) and many more.There exists a special cell of the institute named as Competitive Examination Cell(CEC-VIIT) which conducts the seminar of well known speakers and officers to motivate the students for different exams mainly UPSC,MPSC, GATE and other national and state level exams.Using this different cells one can make his/her overall development in his/her interested areas.The institute has tie-up with several different industries and research oriented organizations. This organizations plays an important role for final year projects including the provision of fund and sponsorship. They also provides the internship opportunities to the students. So one get the best possible practical experience.Coming to the placement point, it has an average of 75–125 companies visiting the campus every year. So one can hope for a good job. The average package is in the range of 3.5L t0 4.5L. However some dream companies also visits the campus for recruitment. Along with the ON campus placements the institute also provides the facility of OFF campus placements.The institute allows the students to participate in several competitions such as Hackathon, Robocon and Supra etc. Institute also organizes its own national level competition namely, Perception(includes technical events) and Gandharva(includes cultural events).So overall one can well enjoy the four year engineering life along with the technical and professional growth.Hopes it will be a satisfied answer.
